title: A New Version of the VeriCoin Wallet is Available
description:
This update adds a number of new features to the wallet, including: New tabs for the SuperNET Gateway, in-wallet IRC Chat and News feed; Auto and manual checks for new versions of the wallet; A new method of quickly bootstrapping the blockchain; User friendly option to re-scan the wallet; Numerous UI tweaks, including the option to hide decimal places in currencies; wallet window resizing; A VeriCoin Ticker for news alerts; And the usual bug fix or two.

Note: As soon as SuperNET v1 is launched, we will release a new version of the wallet that integrates the SuperNet fully.
trustedUrls: www.bter.com, bter.com, www.litebit.eu, litebit.eu, www.bittrex.com, bittrex.com, www.cryptsy.com, cryptsy.com
